https://tmrev.io/movie/72887-Brain's Lessons: Shredding Repis on the Gnar Gnar Rad 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/72887-Brain's Lessons: Shredding Repis on the Gnar Gnar Rad 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Finally, a DVD with attitude! Hear and see the Primus drummer break down go-go, funk patterns, the ostinato and the up-down technique in Brain's contemporary and alternative way. This DVD is not only educational, but entertaining as well. Suitable for all levels of playing. DVD special features include a photo gallery, additional video footage (outtakes, village video, influences, the Buckethead dance, Q/A), an interactive drumset, and printable lessons from Brain. Brain's Lessons: Shredding Repis on the Gnar Gnar Rad
